title: Daily Reminder to look at patch notes

replies.body: You know the ones that don't read patch notes don't get on the boards.

What are patch notes?
Can I eat it?
No, stupid. Patch notes is the new champion

Really?
I thought the new champion was Toph Befong.
Riot really should announce these things where people can see them.

> [{quoted}](name=Ariel the Cruel,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fY2vgA6A,comment-id=0000000200000000,timestamp=2016-05-04T02:05:35.827+0000)
>
> I thought the new champion was Toph Befong.

EXACTLY WHAT I THOUGHT

I know I'm going to be crucified for saying it...

But not even Toph is that cute.

Not going to agree or disagree.
But the character seems to be around mid-to-late teens.
For Toph we've seen:
- 6-year old.
- Middle-aged adult.
- Cranky old crone.

Plenty of room to fit this new one into the time line. ;p
I thought {{champion:83}} was the new champion.
There's something wrong with your box. It looks funny.
Known forum bug. That's supposed to be Valor.

> [{quoted}](name=TheLastShadow45,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fY2vgA6A,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-03T15:38:02.711+0000)
>
> You know the ones that don't read patch notes don't get on the boards.

well I can try

I can't wait for all the confused people when they see pink wards only have 4 health.....

....that would require people to buy pink wards though which doesn't happen much at my elo.

> [{quoted}](name=Randomonium,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fY2vgA6A,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-05-03T16:49:50.913+0000)

>

{{champion:92}} : "OMFG JANNA YOU BOUGHT THE WRONG PINK THIS ONE ONLY HAS 4 HEALTH"
{{champion:40}} : "Sigh... back to muting my teammates and humming disney songs..."
{{champion:92}} : "WTF THEIR SUPPORT IS A NOOB TOO WHAT DUMBASSES"
{{champion:40}} : *HUMMING INTENSIFIES*
{{champion:40}} : ''LET IT GO, LET IT GOOOOOOO!!!''

Riot favor {{champion:202}} finally.
4 is the most beautiful number! Number of the art!
{{champion:1}} My lucky number!

> WHY DOES BRAND DO SO MUCh DAMAGE

I do this already so...

"WHY DOES BRAND DO SO MUCH DAMAGE"

Whos not already saying that...
Just don't be that guy who calls {{champion:69}} a hacker for using the grounded debuff.
Another reason for Thresh mains to facedesk to no end.
Not like the ADC was going to take it anyways.
You missed the much more catastrophic "It's k we can tower dive at level 3 we'll just switch off OH MY GOD WHAT IS HAPPENING"

\>Teamfighting is suicide against new mages
\>turrets are buffed splitpushing is no longer effective

Back to season 1!

> [{quoted}](name=Gigahappytown,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fY2vgA6A,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-05-03T16:27:39.621+0000)
>
> \>Teamfighting is suicide against new mages
> \>turrets are buffed splitpushing is no longer effective
> 
> Back to season 1!

They were only slightly buffed, and Ziggs can now split with his turret execute.
Lol no this doesn't give him the ability to splitpush. It amplifies his team play for sieging.

I thought everybody was complaining towers were weak and mages were weak and both needed buffs? 

I-I MEAN

LOL RIOT LEE SIN IS OP AND MAGES AND TYLER1 WTF RITO

> [{quoted}](name=Gigahappytown,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fY2vgA6A,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-05-03T16:27:39.621+0000)
>
> \>Teamfighting is suicide against new mages
> \>turrets are buffed splitpushing is no longer effective
> 
> Back to season 1!

{{champion:115}}  is the new split-pusher that combines both of these.
These patch notes actually took me an hour and 20 minutes to read. I mean, yes I read every last word, but still, this one was a doozy. But it was worth, gotta educate yourself, ya know?

Seriously, it took pretty much my evening yesterday to read it once, understand, and memorize the champ changes, item changes (which I find much more difficult to internalize than champ changes), buff, dragon, and herald changes, Taliyah (Ik she's not live, but still) and whatever else.

But it's satisfying when you get it, and you can enter a game fully informed.
So true, but now since you know all about the patch you have a nice advantage over those people who either didn't read at all or just read about certain things.
i already love the flame in all chat when ppl try to {{item:3140}} {{champion:238}} ult
People think its cool to show ignorance and type "wtf lol"
Sounds like Ghetto culture
I'm 12 and what is ths?
Daily Reminder that daily reminders aren't actually posted daily

bitch plz

have a skarner in the game

watch people ask: ''what are those things?''

Are the patch notes out yet though? I haven't seen them on the main page, on the news, or even when I went to news>game updates>patch there was just 6.8 stuff there. I mean they're on the pbe but that's got some other stuff too so you can't just go off that. Help would be appreciated though haha

surrenderat20.com 

Easy
the official patch notes are better because of the context...

Surrender@20 literally just copy + pastes the patch notes from the PBE

Sure, there might be minimal things that are changed (the largest/most recent that I remember is Nid rooting jg monsters), but at least it stops the posts like
"omg riot do something about afk's"
or 
"Rito please remove devourer"
But the PBE doesn't release patch notes though.

Surrender@20 covers all sorts of League-related news, they're not limited to PBE updates and haven't ever been in my memory. They post Riot employee updates and comments on the boards if they include useful info, and they always post the update times and notes for the next patch...
Yeah, but @Slythion said that FF@20 just copy+pastes the patch notes from PBE. The PBE doesn't release patch notes and Moobeat, from FF@20, digs through the files and everything to find the changes.
As far as I'm aware, they show us patch notes that were changed on the PBE so I assumed that they got them from the PBE.
Surrender@20 is nice for people who don't have a PBE account, or the time to dig through files. Filthy Casual for life.
No, Moobeat goes through the files to find changes. They mention it when they say new files have been added and its how we get info for new skins or features.
They also post patch notes whenever riot does, basically making surrender@20 a one-stop-shop for most League news.

70% of the playerbase don't want to be informed, they just want to play and could care less about what changed every two weeks.

I wish they would give a damn though... Would make the game more fun instead of winning because they don't understand the new mechanics.
More like "What the **** is malz now?"

Not sure why you placed Brand there as someone that does so much damage. Every ability was nerfed; base damage AND AP ratios (except for his W). His passive, which was originally 8% max health is now 2%. He can no longer bully someone out of lane, still has crazy high mana costs (which are even worse now with no mana regen). But it's "ok" because his passive is great in teamfights. Now he's just bad in everything else :).
